question_text: Why is a thin client suitable for accessing Desktop as a Service (DaaS) solutions?
answer_options: It connects to a local hypervisor for direct VM access
It only needs to support basic peripherals and network communication
It includes a full OS capable of VM management
correct_answer: It only needs to support basic peripherals and network communication
explanation: Thin clients are ideal for DaaS because the computing is handled remotely; the endpoint only handles display, input, and networking.
